code: import products from'../products.json';export default function filterList(array1,filterMechanism){if(filterMechanism==null)return products;else{return products.filter(function(product){var sizeArray=product.size.split(" ");if(array1.length>0){if(sizeArray.some(function(r){return array1.indexOf(r)>=0;})){return product;}}else{return products;}});}}
